name: Cleaver
description: Very high damage but very slow attack speed.{"Who needs brains when you have a sword this size!?", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Warrior
description: An all-round fighter with average health and damage.{"Always first on the front lines, but never alone for long.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Plasma Marines
description: Ranged Minions with average damage, speed and health.{"When you crash-land on a strange planet, there's only one rule: Shoot first.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Grenadier
description: Damages groups of ground enemies.{"He set out to make a hair balm, but it somehow turned out so potent it's lethal! Still does wonders for shine and volume, though.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Lightning Bolt
description: {"Destroy", "TERM","DestroyBuff"} a random enemy Minion or Building.{"Blink and you'll miss it... 'cause you'll be dead.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Living Statue
description: Only attacks Buildings.{"It's said that if you pick a flower within Apep's mighty gardens, the statues come to life to defend its beauty.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Dragon Whelp
description: Can fly, which is good against melee ground Minions.{"Part dragon. Part demon. All cuteness.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Scrat Pack
description: Good for taking bridges and as cheap targets.{"Scrats are the pest of the arenas, no matter how many you kill there always seem to be more.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Ghost Turret
description: Defensive Building with good damage and attack speed.On death, give a random friendly Minion {"Spirit", "TERM","SpiritBuff"}.

name: Fireball
description: Deals damage to enemies in the area.{"Great against groups of low to medium health enemies.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Boomer
description: Hatches from an {"Egg", "TERM","BoomerEgg"} after a short delay. The Boomer explodes on contact or death.{"Voidborne Wound", "TERM","VoidborneWound"}: Reduce Mana cost by 1.

name: Swarmers
description: Swarmers are fast and have decent damage but low health.{"Swarmers might be blind, but they'll always smell your fear.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Succubus
description: {"Netherstep", "TERM","SuccubusTeleport"} backwards when damaged by melee attackers.{"The dark sorceresses of Shars'Rakk are able to step through the fabric of reality to safety.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Swarmer Totem
description: Summons groups of {"Swarmers", "CARD_REF","Swarmer"} over time.

name: Demon Warrior
description: From the 5th time this card is played and beyond, Demon Warrior has triple health and damage.

name: Cannon Roller
description: Rolls backwards when it fires.

name: Ghost
description: Possesses an enemy, turning it to your side. The enemy becomes {"Cursed", "TERM","CursedBuff"}.Masters and Mythic units get stunned for 10 seconds instead.

name: Last Stand
description: Summons 5 {"Legionnaires", "CARD_REF","Legionair"}.If your opponent controls both bridges, summon 7 instead.

name: Sniper Scrat
description: Very long range and good damage, but takes a while to aim.

name: Soul Stealer
description: {"Soul Steal", "TERM","SoulStealBuff"}.{"Only the most fanatical Slitherbound are granted insight into the cruel arts of the Slither Lords.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Bridge Shrine
description: Generates an additional point of XP whenever you earn XP from the bridge in the same lane as this building.

name: Assassin
description: {"Stealth", "TERM","StealthBuff"}.Deals triple damage when attacking while Stealthed.

name: Blind Date
description: Summons a random 5-mana minion card.

name: Divine Warrior
description: {"Divine Shield", "TERM","DivineShield"}.{"Though she failed her trials with the Chapel of Light, she still picked up a few tricks.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Scrat Horde
description: Summons a horde of small Scrats.

name: Mana Puff
description: Can only be summoned near your Master Tower.Remains on bridges and while on a bridge it generates 1 mana every 10 seconds. (First after 4 seconds)

name: Defenso Chopper
description: When hit by melee attackers, it deals 75 counter damage and {"Stuns", "TERM","StunBuff"} them for 3 seconds.

name: Banner Man
description: Starts with a {"Shield", "TERM","SingleShieldBuff"}. Grants a Shield to 5 nearby Friendly Minions.{"Empyrean banner men spark hope in the followers of the light, and fear in its enemies.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Healing Fireball
description: {"Heals", "TERM","HealsKeyword"} Friendly Minions in the area. Healing is split evenly between all friendly minions in the area.{"Yes, it is a HEALING fireball...", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Shock Rock
description: {"Stuns", "TERM","StunBuff"} and damages enemies in the area.

name: Stun Blast
description: {"Stuns", "TERM","StunBuff"} enemies in the area.

name: Wizard Puff
description: Can only be summoned near your Master Tower.If it dies, {"Transform", "TERM","TransformBuff"} a random enemy Minion or Building into a friendly {"Mana Puff", "CARD_REF","ManaPuff"}.

name: Priestess
description: She will constantly {"Heal", "TERM","HealKeyword"} a nearby damaged friendly Minion.

name: Re-Boomer
description: Hatches from an {"Egg", "TERM","ReBoomerEgg"} after a short delay. As a Boomer it explodes on contact or death, but turns back into an egg.

name: Colossus
description: Swipes enemies in a huge arc in front of it.{"This lumbering hunk of evil is probably the best at what it does.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Beam of DOOM!
description: Deals massive damage in a small area.{"A popular UFO weapon.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Laser Turret
description: When staying on the same target, it fires faster and faster.

name: Whirly Scrat
description: Deals damage in an area around himself.{"Has a hard time socializing.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Illusory Cleaver
description: Summons an {"Illusion", "TERM","Illusion"} of a {"Cleaver", "CARD_REF","Cleaver"}.

name: Troubadour
description: {"Taunt", "TERM","TauntBuff"}.{"Revelry", "TERM","HiglandRevelry"}: give nearby enemy Minions {"Slow", "TERM","AntiFrenzy"}.{"He only ever learned one song, but to compensate he plays it constantly.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Snake Druid
description: {"Call Slitherbound", "TERM","Cohort"}.His attacks immobilize enemies for 5 seconds.

name: Dragon Pack
description: 3 Dragon Whelps. Highly effective against melee ground Minions.{"A devastating pack of flying evil. And cuteness", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Scrat Launcher
description: Massive range, always shoots at the nearest enemy building.{"Scrats go in; screaming, rocket-powered balls of fur come out.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Drone Walker
description: Solid ranged attacker with no fear.

name: Legionnaires
description: A tough group of melee fighters.

name: Harbinger
description: Has an extremely long range and causes knock-back.{"Wields the most powerful magic of the Slither Lords, but his slavedriving days have taught him to let others do the rushing.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Annihilator
description: Deals damage in a large area.{"This is as big as guns get. Yes, it does area damage.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Stun Lancers
description: Attacks {"Stuns", "TERM","StunBuff"} enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Disruptor Puff
description: Can only be summoned near your Master Tower.Remains on bridges and while on a bridge it teleports to the other bridge every 6 seconds. (First after 2 seconds)

name: Dragon Nest
description: {"Mythic", "TERM","MythicBuff"}Summons a {"Flightless Dragon", "CARD_REF","FlightlessDragon"} when you play a Spell.Summons a {"Dragon Whelp", "CARD_REF","DragonWhelp"} instead if the Spell cost 4+ mana.

name: Crossbow Guild
description: Summons {"Crossbow Dudes", "CARD_REF","CrossbowDude"} over time.

name: Future Past
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with a random 1-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 1.

name: Call To Arms
description: Summon a {"Warrior", "CARD_REF","Warrior"} by your Master Tower and Transform each of your non-master Buildings to Warriors.

name: Blood Imps
description: {"Blood Pact", "TERM","BloodConnection"}{"Even in death they're annoying.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Trick Swap
description: Swaps the location of ALL minions on both bridges and Stuns enemies for 4 seconds.StunsStunned Units are unable to move or attack.

name: Crossbow Dudes
description: Cheap ranged support with low health and damage.

name: Black Hole
description: Sucks up ALL minions in an area, removing them from the board for the rest of the spell's duration.

name: Burn The Bridges
description: Both bridges get covered in flames, dealing damage to ground Minions.Damage: 200Duration: 5 seconds.

name: Tombstone
description: Place a Tombstone that resurrects the next minion belonging to Mordar that dies, after a delay.

name: Infiltration
description: Summon 4 {"Plasma Marines", "CARD_REF","PlasmaMarine"} anywhere in the Arena.

name: Daggerfall
description: Deals low damage in a large area.{"Great against hordes of low health enemies, such as Scrats!", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Bounty Sniper
description: Gives you 2 XP whenever it kills a Minion or damages the enemy Master.Gain {"Shield", "TERM","SingleShieldBuff"} if you have less XP than your opponent.

name: Blastmancer
description: When attacking an enemy that dies, perform {"Soul Detonate", "TERM","SoulDetonateBuff"}.

name: Styxi
description: {"Stealth", "TERM","StealthBuff"}.If Styxi attacks a target but doesn't kill it, he'll stop attacking for 5 seconds.

name: Gax the World Bomb
description: Hatches from an {"Egg", "TERM","GaxEgg"} after a short delay. On contact or death, he blows up to deal damage to EVERYTHING.

name: Rammer
description: Moves fast and only attacks Buildings.{"He hates buildings for some reason. Efficient at deconstruction!", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Zeppelin Bomber
description: Flies over the battlefield towards enemy Master Tower and drops bombs every [av:ZeppelinBomber.AttackCooldown] seconds along the way.

name: Blue Golem
description: Has high health and high damage.{"Hard as a rock, both physically and emotionally.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Rampage
description: Gives friendly Minions {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"}.{"A vial of unbridled malice from a thousand demons, with a hint of lime.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Heal Puff
description: Can only be summoned near your Master Tower.Remains on bridges and while on a bridge it {"Heals", "TERM","HealsKeyword"} your Master for 20 health per second.

name: Red Golem
description: Summon a {"Blue Golem", "CARD_REF","BlueGolem"}.If you have 50% or less health, summon a {"Red Golem", "CARD_REF","RedGolem"} instead.

name: Scrat Tank
description: When not attacking, the Scrat Tank becomes completely immune to damage and stuns.

name: Raging Reinforcements
description: Summons a {"Dragon Whelp", "CARD_REF","DragonWhelp"} or a {"Warrior", "CARD_REF","Warrior"} or 4 {"Crossbow Dudes", "CARD_REF","CrossbowDude"} and gives them {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"}.

name: Wall
description: Lots of health, but no attack.{"A perfect distraction for building haters.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Spiritmancer
description: When attacking an enemy that dies, perform {"Soul Rip", "TERM","SoulRipBuff"}.

name: Undying Skeleton
description: Leaves an {"Undying Corpse", "TERM","UndyingCorpse"} the first time it dies.

name: Walking Blind Date
description: {"Taunt", "TERM","TauntBuff"}, {"Rush", "TERM","RushBuff"}.When killed, it summons a random 4 mana {"Minion", "CARD_REF","WalkingBlindDate"} card.

name: Propeller Scrats
description: Quick and weak flying melee Minions.{"Just like normal Scrats - except they tied propellers to their tails!", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Tranquil Shi-Hou
description: {"Heals", "TERM","HealsKeyword"} himself when no enemies are near.{"Not a fan of monkey business.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Battle Shi-Hou
description: Attacks faster for each enemy within range (Max 350% bonus for 5 enemies).{"A big fan of monkey business.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Chain Lightning
description: Damages and {"Stuns", "TERM","StunBuff"}, then jumps to a nearby enemy up to 10 times.

name: Spear Throwers
description: Their first attack is a ranged spear with double damage.

name: Guardian
description: Absorbs all damage dealt to nearby Crystal Elf Minions.

name: Shield Totem
description: Summon a Shield Totem that makes the Master Tower immune to damage.

name: Blast Entry
description: A Mythic Settsu enters the battlefield with a [av:SettsuMinion.MaxHealth] health shield and deals [sv:BlastEntry.Damage] damage to nearby enemies on impact.

name: Spirit Vessel
description: Gives a random friendly Minion {"Spirit", "TERM","SpiritBuff"} when killed.

name: Xiao Long
description: When a spell is played, Xiao Long pops into another realm for 2 seconds. He also gains {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"} and {"Haste", "TERM","FrenzyBuff"}.

name: Bazooka Scrat
description: Only attacks buildings.{"To the untrained eye it might look like he only carries one rocket, but maybe that eye just doesn't understand Scrat technology, okay?!", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Hypnotize
description: {"Cohort", "TERM", "Cohort"} (2).For the duration Enemy Minions attack random friendly units within range, if able.

name: Magma Storm
description: Calls down 10 magma rocks in a large area. Also deals damage to friendly Units.

name: Spirit Infusion
description: Gives 3 random friendly Minions {"Spirit", "TERM","SpiritBuff"} over 6 seconds.{"Accursed Ascension", "TERM","AccursedAffinity"}: Gives an extra Spirit.

name: Arcane Missiles
description: Fires a volley of arcane missiles in the selected direction.Damage: 150

name: Arcane Golem
description: When you cast a spell, it gains +30 health and +5 damage

name: Fire Imp
description: Leaves a fiery {"DOT", "TERM","FireImpFireKeyword"} on the ground that deals heavy damage to ground Units in the area.{"A pyromaniac who loves to incinerate his enemies.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Future Present
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with a random 2-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 2.

name: Shielded Crossbow Dudes
description: {"SingleShieldBuff", "TERM", "SingleShieldBuff"}.If your opponent controls both bridges, summon 1 extra.

name: Prowler
description: Jumps at enemies at range, dealing double damage.{"This monster was bred to hunt. It is well known for pouncing on unsuspecting enemies.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Elite Swarmer
description: A fast and somewhat durable monster.

name: S.T.INT
description: {"ScrapTech", "TERM", "ScrapTech"}: Spend [cv:GatlingBike.Variable] 50 to claim the furthest bridge on summon.[f:The Single-Track Interceptor - or S.T.INT - Is a fast and cheap ranged Minion that packs quite a punch for its size.]

name: Drone Buzzers
description: Versatile but weak flying Minions.{"Known as Buzzers because they're small and irritating, and a good swat takes care of them.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: "Armored" Scrats
description: {"Barrel Shield", "TERM","BarrelShield"}.{"These Scrats are surprisingly hardy, maybe they're not just regular Scrats wearing a barrel.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: More Dakka!
description: Ratbo fires a minigun salvo at the nearest enemy. It deals more damage for each friendly Minion in the arena.Damage per Minion: 40Delay: 1 secondsDeals reduced damage to Masters

name: Commander Azali
description: When you take a bridge, Azali grants {"Shield", "TERM","SingleShieldBuff"} to all friendly ground Minions.{"Big and strong, the Commander will show the way!", "SUBTEXT"}

name: AtG Drone x8
description: A tough but slow flier with only Air-to-Ground weaponry. Shoots 7 projectiles at random nearby targets.

name: Healing Shrine
description: {"Heals", "TERM","HealsKeyword"} all nearby friendly minions over time.

name: Combustion
description: After a delay, friendly minions explode, dealing 50 damage to themselves and nearby Enemies every 0.2 seconds, up to 4 times.

name: Musketeer
description: {"Call Slitherbound", "TERM","Cohort"}.Deflects melee attackers, then ripostes for double damage.

name: Morgrul the Swarmer King
description: On Summon and on Death, Morgrul roars and calls 3 {"Swarmers", "CARD_REF","Swarmer"} to his side, damages and knock enemies back.

name: Scott The Sensitive Savage
description: Will {"Cry", "TERM","CryBuff"} at 50% health.{"Though a fierce fighter, Scott is also a little emotional. Don't worry though, he'll be ok and back in the fight soon enough!", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Flightless Dragons
description: Vulnerable, but with extremely high damage.{"Baby dragons play rough. Unfortunately, angering your big sister could make her take a bite out of your wing.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Gor'Rakk Sacrifice
description: {"Stuns", "TERM","StunBuff"} a random Minion under your control for 4 seconds, then {"Transform", "TERM","TransformBuff"} it into a {"Cleaver", "CARD_REF","Cleaver"}.This spell cannot target Mythic Minions.

name: Bridge Buddies
description: Summon a {"Scrat", "CARD_REF","MeleeScrat"} on both bridges.If you already own the bridge, the Scrat gains {"Barrel Shield", "TERM","BarrelShield"}.

name: Cursebearer
description: {"Cursed Aura", "TERM","CursedAuraBuff"}.{"Reanimated in the pits of the Cursed Tundra, this forgotten soul leaves a trail of decay in its wake.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Magma Cannon
description: Fires flaming balls of magma at enemies in range.{"For when you need more firepower.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Lost Legionnaires
description: {"Empyrean Army", "TERM","EmpyreanArmy"}: Gain {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"}.{"They may be lost from their battalion, but these two hardy soldiers are great when you just need a couple extra.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Gambler's Ball
description: Casts either a {"Healing Fireball", "CARD_REF", "HealingFireball"} or {"Fireball", "CARD_REF", "fireball"}.{"Sacrifice", "TERM","SacrificeBuff"}: Gain 20% chance to cast both for each Slitherbound sacrificed.{"Like a certain serpent once said; "Luck iss a ssskill".", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Ravenous Swarmers
description: If the last card you played was a Spell, they gain {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"} and {"Haste", "TERM","FrenzyBuff"}.

name: Screaming Scrat
description: {"Barrel Shield", "TERM","BarrelShield"}, {"Taunt", "TERM","TauntBuff"}, {"Rush", "TERM","RushBuff"}.Moves towards the enemy master until it {"Explodes", "TERM","MalfunctionBuffScreamingScrat"} after some time or when the Barrel Shield is destroyed, dealing damage to all nearby ground Units.

name: Gor'Rakk Brutes
description: Summons a {"Cleaver", "CARD_REF", "Cleaver"}, but if the last card you played was a 3-mana Spell, also summons a {"Rammer", "CARD_REF", "Rammer"}.

name: Netherstep
description: Teleports friendly ground Minions in the area along the path to the enemy Master.{"Voidborne Wound", "TERM","VoidborneWound"}: Reduce Mana cost by 1.This spell cannot target Mythic Minions.

name: Incubus
description: {"Netherstep", "TERM","SuccubusTeleport"} towards enemy ranged attackers.

name: Brutish Betrayer
description: Only attacks buildings.Has {"Blood Pact", "TERM","BloodConnection"}.

name: Shars'Rakk Twins
description: Summon an {"Incubus", "CARD_REF", "Incubus"}. If the last card you played was a [cv:DeadlyTwins.AdditionalUnitTriggerVariable]+ Mana Spell, also summon a {"Succubus", "CARD_REF", "Succubus"}.

name: Dragon Ball
description: It's a fireball, but a {"Flightless Dragon", "CARD_REF","FlightlessDragon"} summons in the wake. If the last card you played was a Minion card with a mana cost of 5 or more: summon a {"Dragon Whelp", "CARD_REF","DragonWhelp"} instead.

name: A.I.M. Bot
description: Start with {"SingleShieldBuff", "TERM", "SingleShieldBuff"}.{"ScrapTech", "TERM", "ScrapTech"}: Spend 50 Tech to gain {"Marksmanship", "TERM","Marksmanship"}.Spend 40 more to also gain {"FrenzyBuff", "TERM", "FrenzyBuff"}.

name: Sniper Squad
description: Very long range, but takes a long time to load.{"Sometimes less is more, but when it comes to big guns that's definitely not the case!", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Cheese Date
description: Summons a random 3-mana Scrat Minion card and give it {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"}.

name: Sun Burn
description: Give all Minions in a small area {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"} and deal 10 damage 10 times.

name: Clear Skies
description: {"Heals", "TERM","HealsKeyword"} all Minions and Masters for 250 health and removes {"Shield", "TERM","SingleShieldBuff"} and {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"}.

name: Rabid Prowler
description: {"Cohort", "TERM", "Cohort"}.Jumps at enemies at range, dealing double damage.{"SacrificeBuff", "TERM", "SacrificeBuff] ([cv:RabidProwler.AdditionalUnitTriggerVariable])]]: Gain [actorskillinfo:SuperRageBuff,[mec:[r:SuperRageBuff"}.

name: Tantrum Throwers
description: Summon 2 {"SpearThrowers", "CARD_REF", "SpearThrowers"}, If your opponent controls both bridges, summon 1 extra. They gain {"RageBuff", "TERM", "RageBuff"}.

name: Propeller Horde
description: If a friendly minion has {"RageBuff", "TERM", "RageBuff"}, summon 2 more.

name: Empowered Soul Stealer
description: {"SoulStealBuff", "TERM", "SoulStealBuff"},{"SacrificeBuff", "TERM", "SacrificeBuff"}: Gain [cv:EmpoweredSoulStealer.Variable] Souls on spawn +[v:SummonWithSoulStealerLogic.SOUL_PER_SACRIFICE] for each {"Slave", "TERM", "Slave"} sacrificed.

name: Crystal Archers
description: {"Mana Surge", "TERM","ManaSurgeBuff"}Fragile, but deadly at long range.

name: Crystal Arcanist
description: {"Mana Surge", "TERM","ManaSurgeBuff"}.Deals damage to groups of enemies.{"She's read the books of the Crystal Spire for 216 years, now it's time to let loose! And boy is it fun to blow up groups of enemies!", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Arcane Bolt
description: {"Overload", "TERM", "Overload] ([cv:ArcaneBolt.Variable])]].[actorskillinfo:StunBuff,[mec:{"StunBuff"} the highest health ground Minion in an area.If it has [v:SpellStunHighestHealthKillIfLowHealth.KILL_HEALTH_MAX", "TERM", "StunBuff"} the highest health ground Minion in an area.If it has [v:SpellStunHighestHealthKillIfLowHealth.KILL_HEALTH_MAX"} or less Health while stunned, {"DestroyBuff", "TERM", "DestroyBuff"} it.

name: Crystal Sentry
description: {"Overload", "TERM", "Overload"} ([cv:CrystalSentry.Variable])]], {"ManaSurgeBuff", "TERM", "ManaSurgeBuff"}.A versatile ranged fighter.[f:The Sentries of the Crystal Spire train for centuries to master their deadly glaives. They might save time by using a less complicated weapon, but where's the fun in that?]

name: Armored Escort
description: Summons 2 {"Crystal Sentries", "CARD_REF","CrystalSentry"} with {"Mana Surge", "TERM","ManaSurgeBuff"} to escort the next Ranged Minion you play.{"No, not that kind of escort.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Crystal Construct
description: Gain 1 Mana on death.{"The Crystal Constructs act as both shield and stockpile for the magically dependent elven army.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Lord-Sentinel Thelec
description: {"Mana Surge", "TERM","ManaSurgeBuff"}.If you have 4 Spells in your deck, also summon 6 {"Crystal Archers", "CARD_REF","CrystalArcher"}.{"The Lord-Sentinel truly leads from the front.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Mana Puff Madness
description: Summons 4 {"Mana Puffs", "CARD_REF","ManaPuff"} at the Master Tower for each team.{"You can never quite know Puffs will do when they appear - besides look cute!", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Wheel Of Doom
description: Hits ALL ground target in a line 2 times. If something survives both hits, the Wheel breaks.{"Invented by a madman and infused with magic.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Nether Bats
description: Will sometimes {"Netherstep", "TERM","SuccubusTeleport"} towards a random enemy Minion. Also Nethersteps on summon. {"In the void, their sense of direction is impeccable.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Wolf Among Sheep
description: Summon 4 {"Legionair", "CARD_REF", "Legionnaires"}. One of them gains {"LycanthropyBuff", "TERM", "LycanthropyBuff"} at random.

name: Once Bitten
description: Give the nearest friendly ground Minion in the area {"Lycanthropy", "TERM","LycanthropyBuff"}.This spell can only be played in your own arena and it cannot target Mythic Minions.

name: Bats Bats Bats!
description: For the next 5 seconds summon 1 {"Nether Bat", "CARD_REF","BlinkBat"} for each mana you spend, that instantly {"Netherstep", "TERM","SuccubusTeleport"} in the direction of the played card. Playing it again prolongs the duration.{"Much like mosquitoes, Nether Bats are annoying alone, but terrifying in a swarm!", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Grasping Thorns
description: Slows enemies to 2 speed and deals damage in an area.Can only be cast in your own arena.

name: Lone Wolf
description: {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"}.If there are no other Minions under your command when this {"Warrior", "CARD_REF","Warrior"} is summoned, she gains {"Lycanthropy", "TERM","LycanthropyBuff"}.

name: Crossbow Trap
description: Fires bolts at nearby minions.DPS: [math:[av:CrossbowTrap.Damage]/[av:CrossbowTrap.AttackCooldown]]Health: [av:CrossbowTrap.MaxHealth]Duration: [av:CrossbowTrap.LifeTime] secondsWhen used, this card becomes a {"DionaDecoyTrap", "TERM", "DionaDecoyTrap"}

name: Decoy Trap
description: Taunts nearby minionsHealth: [av:DecoyTrap.MaxHealth]Duration: [av:DecoyTrap.LifeTime] secWhen used, this card becomes a {"DionaCrossBowTrap", "TERM", "DionaCrossBowTrap"}.

name: Howling Moon
description: Reduce all minions to 50% health and summon 2 {"Werewolves", "CARD_REF","Werewolf"} by your Master Tower.

name: Bahra the Witchwolf
description: When summoned, Bahra immobilizes all enemy ground Minions for 6 seconds.He uses his powerful moonbeam {"DOT", "TERM","WitchWolfBeamKeyword"} to damage groups of enemies.

name: Shieldguard Of Light
description: {"Armor of Light", "TERM","ArmorOfLight"}, {"Shield Slam", "TERM","ChargeBuff"}.{"Having an Armor of Light doesn't stop this overly cautious Brother from bringing a shield into battle.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Brothers Of Light
description: {"Armor of Light", "TERM","ArmorOfLight"}.{"From the Chapter of Light, the very elite of the Empyrean army.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Squire Puff
description: Can only be summoned near your Master Tower.Remains on bridges and while on a bridge it gives 3 friendly ground Minions {"Shield", "TERM","SingleShieldBuff"} every 10 seconds. (First after 4 seconds){"Empyrean Army", "TERM","EmpyreanArmy"}: Give 5 Minions Shield instead.

name: Gor'Rakk Gate
description: Open a portal to the void and Summon either of the following with {"Blood Pact", "TERM","BloodConnection"}: - 7x {"Swarmers", "CARD_REF","Swarmer"}, - 2x {"Dragon Whelps", "CARD_REF","DragonWhelp"},  - 1x {"Cleaver", "CARD_REF","Cleaver"}

name: Crakgul Doomcleaver
description: When killing a Minion or hitting the enemy Master, reduce the mana cost of a random voidborne Card in hand by 1 until it is played.{"Crakgul inspires his demon brethren with a celebration of killing.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Morgrul's Ragers
description: {"Voidborne Wound", "TERM","VoidborneWound"}: When Morgrul's Ragers are Summoned, all friendly Minions gain {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"}.{"The savagery of Morgrul's elites inspires others to murder a little harder.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Shadow Whelp
description: {"Stealth", "TERM","StealthBuff"}.Deals triple damage when attacking while Stealthed.

name: Caeleth Dawnhammer
description: {"Armor of Light", "TERM","ArmorOfLight"}.Gain {"Divine Shield", "TERM","DivineShield"} when Armor of Light activates.{"Empyrean Army", "TERM","EmpyreanArmy"}: gain {"Taunt", "TERM","TauntBuff"}.

name: Stormy
description: Shoots {"Chain Lightning", "CARD_REF", "ChainLightning"} at enemies, damaging itself in the process.{"Zen-Chi Flow", "TERM","ZenChiFlow"}: Stormy gains +100 health.

name: Shen Stormstrike
description: {"Stuns", "TERM","StunBuff"} for 2 seconds. If enemy is already stunned, he instead unleashes a powerful blast.{"Zen-Chi Flow", "TERM","ZenChiFlow"}: Stun all nearby enemies when played for 3 seconds.

name: Poison Strike
description: Inflicts {"Poison", "TERM","PoisonBuff"} to all enemies in the area.{"Shower your enemies with the noxious fluids of Akinlep the Tainted today!", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Jungle Jumble
description: Remove this card and shuffle 3 Unique Zen-Chi Minion cards into your deck.They gain {"Growthburst Shroom", "TERM","BerryBuff"}.

name: Zap Shrine
description: {"Stuns", "TERM","StunBuff"} the closest enemy for 2 seconds.{"Zen-Chi Flow", "TERM","ZenChiFlow"}: Stun all enemies within range for 2 seconds when played.

name: Rock Rivals
description: {"Taunt", "TERM","TauntBuff"}.When first summoned, also summon an enemy {"Living Statue", "CARD_REF","LivingStatue"} at opponent's Master Tower with {"Haste", "TERM","FrenzyBuff"}.

name: Skeleton Horde
description: Skeletons are scrawny fighters, but together they are formidable.

name: Jolo the Hero Scrat
description: 100% chance to avoid any damage, -10% per dodge.Gains {"Haste", "TERM","FrenzyBuff"} when summoned if your hand is full of Scrat cards.{"He's a bit of a showboat.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Nyrvir's Breath
description: Covers a large area with spiritfire burning all ground enemies for 180 damage and summon 4 {"Skeletons", "CARD_REF","Skeleton"} over the duration.{"Accursed Ascension", "TERM","AccursedAffinity"}: Deal an additional 120 damage and summon 4 more {"Skeletons", "CARD_REF","Skeleton"}.

name: Toll of the Dead
description: Summon an {"Undying Skeleton", "CARD_REF","UndyingSkeleton"}.After the second death, its remains linger on the field until..{"Accursed Ascension", "TERM","AccursedAffinity"}: Convert all remains left by this card into {"Undying Corpses", "TERM","UndyingCorpse"}.

name: Lone Scout
description: {"Mana Surge", "TERM","ManaSurgeBuff"}.If there are no other Minions under your command when Lone Scout is Summoned, gain 1 Mana.{"She works best in a party of one.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Border Patrol
description: {"Overload", "TERM", "Overload] ([cv:ForwardScouts.Variable])]].Summon 1 {"CrystalSentry", "CARD_REF", "CrystalSentry"} and 1 {"CrystalMage", "CARD_REF", "CrystalMage"}.If you have only {"CrystalElf", "TERM", "CrystalElf"} units under your command, {"ForwardScouts", "TERM", "ForwardScouts"} gains [actorskillinfo:SingleShieldBuff,[mec:{"SingleShieldBuff"} and [actorskillinfo:Overload,[mec:[r:Overload", "TERM", "SingleShieldBuff"} and [actorskillinfo:Overload,[mec:[r:Overload"} ([v:GainShieldIfOnlyCrystalElfMinions.ADDED_OVERLOAD])]].

name: Haunting Hugger
description: Give targets {"Cursed", "TERM","CursedBuff"}.When the target dies, the Hugger reappears to find a new target.Progress 1 toward Accursed Ascension with each kill.

name: Nyrvir the Fallen
description: Starts as {"Nyrvir Slumbers", "CARD_REF", "NyrvirSlumbers"} in your deck.{"Impactful Entry", "TERM","ImpactfulEntry"}, {"Mythic", "TERM","MythicBuff"}.Nyrvir breathes spiritfire in a large area. Swap This Card For Nyrvir Slumbers when played.

name: Spawn of Fury
description: {"Stuns", "TERM","StunBuff"} a random friendly minion within the area, reduce its max Health and Damage by 33%, then summon a copy of it.This spell cannot target Mythic Minions.

name: The Queen's Dragon
description: The mighty [mec:{"Nyrvir", "TERM", "Nyrvir"}] enters the battlefield with [mec:[av:Nyrvir.MaxHealth] Max Health and [av:Nyrvir.Damage] Damage (Dps: [dps:Nyrvir])]

name: Drain Life
description: Drain 100 health from the closest enemy Minion, transfering it to Morellia Unholy Bargain: Drain 100 health from the 2 closest enemy Minions, transfering it to Morellia

name: Spirit
description: Give a random friendly Minion Spirit (increases max Health). Unholy Bargain: Give 2 random friendly Minions Spirit (increases max Health).

name: Skeletons
description: {"WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk1", "TERM", "WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk1"}[mec:{"WitchQueenPerk2", "TERM", "WitchQueenPerk2"}]: {"WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk2", "TERM", "WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk2"}

name: Forbidden Knowledge
description: 2 of Morellia's 4+ mana spells costs 1 less until played. Does not stack. Unholy Bargain: 2 of Morellia's 4+ mana spells costs 2 less until played. Does not stack.

name: Book of the Dead
description: Replace your hand with pages from the Book of the Dead

name: Slitherbound
description: Summon [cv:SlitherSlaves.SummonAmount] {"SlitherLancerSlave", "CARD_REF", "SlitherLancerSlave"} and [cv:SlitherSlaves.SummonAmounts*0] {"SlitherDarterSlave", "CARD_REF", "SlitherDarterSlave"} that inflicts {"PoisonBuff", "TERM", "PoisonBuff"} for [math:[v:PoisonOnBasicAttack.DARTER_POISON_DURATION]/1000] seconds on attack.[f:Slitherbound get to choose their weapon, but not their chain mate.]

name: Wreckinator 9000
description: This metal monster will first {"slice and dice", "TERM","SliceAndDice"}, then {"slam and bam", "TERM","SlamAndBam"}. At least until it {"Self-Destruct", "TERM","MalfunctionBuff"}s.{"Scrat engineering at its finest.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Caged Prowler
description: After 20 seconds the cage releases the {"Prowler", "CARD_REF","Prowler"} and falls apart.{"Preferring not to face the vicious beasts, Slitherbound typically just activate the cage and run away. Fast.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Slithering Summons
description: {"Call Slitherbound", "TERM","Cohort"}.Summon a {"Living Statue", "CARD_REF","LivingStatue"}, {"Prowler", "CARD_REF","Prowler"} or {"Soul Stealer", "CARD_REF","SoulStealer"}.{"Sacrifice", "TERM","SacrificeBuff"}: reduce mana cost by 1 for each Slitherbound you sacrifice.

name: Herald Ah'Mun
description: {"Call Slitherbound", "TERM","Cohort"} (2).Attacks enemies with his {"Shatter Whip", "TERM","WhipAttackKeyword"}.The first time Ah'Mun dies; {"Sacrifice", "TERM","SacrificeBuff"}: to Ressurect with health equal to 75 health for each Slitherbound sacrificed.

name: Sewer Scrat
description: {"Barrel Shield", "TERM","BarrelShield"}. Attacks inflict 2 seconds of {"Poison", "TERM","PoisonBuff"}.Additionally, when Sewer Scrat is hit by melee attackers, it inflicts {"Poison", "TERM","PoisonBuff"} for 2 seconds.

name: Scratillery
description: Fires 5 furry rockets that each summon a {"Scrat", "CARD_REF","MeleeScrat"} on impact.{"Scrat Swarm", "TERM","ScratSwarm"}: Summoned Scrats gain {"Haste", "TERM","FrenzyBuff"}.

name: Boom Buggy
description: Rains a barrage of 6 missiles at random targets within range.{"Scrat Swarm", "TERM","ScratSwarm"}: Gain {"Marksmanship", "TERM","Marksmanship"}.

name: Ritual of Servitude
description: Summon a random Minion Card with Mana cost equal to the lowest cost card that started in your deck other than this card, including other versions of this card.{"The bindings of the Slither Lords are not easily broken.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Woodsman
description: {"Revelry", "TERM","HiglandRevelry"}: gain {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"} and give nearby enemy Minions {"Slow", "TERM","AntiFrenzy"}.{"As a three-time Mountain Games Timber Champion, he will chop through anything in his path.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: High-Mage Leiliel
description: {"Mana Freeze (2)", "TERM","OverloadMulti"}, {"Mana Surge", "TERM","ManaSurgeBuff"}.While Mana Surge is active, Leiliel absorbs 50% of ranged attack damage and sends it back at attackers.

name: Leiliel's Vortex
description: {"Mana Freeze (1)", "TERM","Overload"}.Pulls all Enemy Minions towards its center, dealing damage to them. Damage is reduced the farther from the center they are.

name: Arcane Ring
description: [actorskillinfo:Overload,[mec:{"Overload", "TERM", "Overload"} ([cv:ArcaneRing.Variable])]].[v:SpellCirclingProjectiles.PROJECTILES] arcane projectiles circle the nearest friendly Minion in the area. They deal damage to the first enemy they touch.Can only be cast in your own arena.

name: Glenn's Brew
description: Give the nearest friendly Minion in the area +100 max health and {"Heal", "TERM","HealKeyword"} it for 400. After 6 seconds, the Minion mysteriously vanishes if it's still under your control.If the target is a Stoutheart, trigger its {"Revelry", "TERM","HiglandRevelry"}.

name: Caber Tosser
description: This powerful Stoutheart tosses his {"Caber", "TERM","HighlandCaber"} at the first nearby enemy.{"Revelry", "TERM","HiglandRevelry"}: Gain another Caber.

name: Frostfeathers
description: Inflicts {"Slow", "TERM","AntiFrenzy"} on attack.{"These small pesky flyers barrage their victims with hail-like projectiles.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Fergus Flagon Fighter
description: Wielding his famous bladed mugs, Fergus does a wild {"Spin-attack", "TERM","FergusSpin"}. After the attack, Fergus gets dizzy and cannot attack or move for 5 seconds.{"Revelry", "TERM","HiglandRevelry"}: Refresh Fergus' attack.

name: Mountainshaper
description: Strikes all enemies in a large area with an earthshattering {"Ground Rupture", "TERM","GroundRupture"} for each charge on Mountainshaper.Mountainshaper gains a charge for every 4 seconds it is in your hand. (Max 5 charges).

name: Frostfeather Flyby
description: 11 {"Frostfeathers", "CARD_REF","Frostfeather"} swoop down to perform one attack on a random enemy minion within the area before flying off.The Frostfeathers move at double speed and inflict {"Slow", "TERM","AntiFrenzy"}.

name: Mal'Shar Shadowfork
description: {"Stealth", "TERM","StealthBuff"}, {"Nether Strike", "TERM","NetherStrike"}.Deals triple damage when attacking while Stealthed.

name: Jade Flingers
description: {"Growthburst Shroom", "TERM","BerryBuff"}.{"Jadespark Jungle is home to the most wondrous plantlife in the world. The Mu-Hou protect it.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Ting, Teng & Tung
description: These brothers count as a single Minion. For every 33% health lost, one of them falls off.Each brother bombards enemies with {"Bounce Berries", "TERM","BouncyBerriesBuff"}.

name: High Inquisitor Ardera
description: {"ZealotLeaderFirst", "TERM", "ZealotLeaderFirst"} burns 6% of her max health each second while attacking.Upon death, she grants {"RageBuff", "TERM", "RageBuff"} to [v:DamageSelfOnAttack.BUFF_TARGETS] nearby friendly Minions. {"Empyrean", "TERM", "Empyrean"} Minions also gain {"DivineShield", "TERM", "DivineShield"}.

name: Brother of the Burning Fist
description: {"Armor of Holy Fire", "TERM","ArmorOfFireBuff"}.{"Clad in steel and holy purpose, The Burning Fist are unyielding and indomitable.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Jahun, Keeper of Jadespark
description: When you play {"Jahun", "TERM", "Jahun"}, add a one-use {"Sunder", "TERM", "Sunder"} card to the top of your deck.{"Jahun", "TERM", "Jahun"} pulls rocks from the earth and slams them back down, dealing [math:[av:Jahun.Damage]/2] damage twice.{"MythicBuff", "TERM", "MythicBuff"}.

name: Jadespark Watchers
description: {"BerryBuff", "TERM", "BerryBuff"}.Summon [cv:MonkeyBusiness.SummonAmount] {"ShiHouMonkey", "CARD_REF", "ShiHouMonkey"} and [cv:MonkeyBusiness.SummonAmounts*0] {"RangedMonkey", "CARD_REF", "RangedMonkey"}.

name: Smite
description: Deal damage to ground Minions in an area.{"Empyrean Army", "TERM","EmpyreanArmy"}: Set {"Holy Fire", "TERM","HolyFireBuff"} to the ground.

name: Ardent Aegis
description: After a delay, summon 2 {"Legionnaires", "CARD_REF","Legionair"} and 2 {"Crossbow Dudes", "CARD_REF","CrossbowDude"} by the nearest friendly ground Minion in the area.Can only be cast in your own arena.If the target is Empyrean {"Heal", "TERM","HealKeyword"} it for 250 health.

name: Windwalker Shi-Hou
description: When summoned, he performs a mighty {"Jump", "TERM","JumpBuff"}.{"The day a Windwalker finds a problem too big to vault is his last.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Shen's Shock Stick
description: {"Growthburst Shroom", "TERM","BerryBuff"}.Cast a {"Shock Rock", "CARD_REF", "ShockRock"} for each charge on this.Gain a charge whenever you plant a Growthburst Shroom while this is in your hand (max 4).

name: Zealots of the Burning Fist
description: Burns 10% of their max health when they attack.If there is only one friendly Zealot in play, she gains {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"} and {"Haste", "TERM","FrenzyBuff"}.

name: Wardancers
description: {"Mana Surge", "TERM","ManaSurgeBuff"}.Two fast hitting short ranged fighters. Far better at dealing damage than at receiving it.

name: Lord Fanriel the Stormcharger
description: {"Mana Surge", "TERM","ManaSurgeBuff"}.{"True Damage", "TERM","TrueDamage"}When no enemies are near, Fanriel begins to {"Stormcharge", "TERM","StormChargeBuff"}.

name: Dormant Defenders
description: Summon 2 {"Crystal Constructs", "CARD_REF","CrystalConstruct"} with {"Dormant", "TERM","DormantBuff"}.Awaken from Dormant state while you have Mana Surge.

name: Sugilite Shield
description: {"Overload", "TERM", "Overload"} Minions within the barrier cannot take ranged damage from outside of the barrier.

name: Restless Dead
description: Summon 2 {"Undying Corpse", "TERM","UndyingCorpse"} randomly in your arena.

name: Unholy Ground
description: Summon a {"Skeleton", "CARD_REF", "Skeleton"} every other second. Enemy Minions in the area lose Flying and are immobilized.{"AccursedAffinity", "TERM", "AccursedAffinity"}: Increase {"Unholy Ground", "TERM", "Unholy Ground"}'s duration by 6 seconds.

name: Corpse Explosion
description: Summon an {"Undying Corpse", "TERM","UndyingCorpse"}.All friendly Undying Corpses under your command explode and deal damage to nearby enemies.Can only be cast in your own arena.

name: Skeleton Crew
description: {"AccursedAffinity", "TERM", "AccursedAffinity"}: Summon 3 more Skeletons.

name: Resonating Blast Crystal
description: Deal damage in an area and drop a Blast Crystal.If you already have a Blast Crystal in play, instead {"Mana Freeze (1)", "TERM","Overload"} and detonate and destroy both.

name: Lady Infray the Spire Warden
description: {"Mana Surge", "TERM","ManaSurgeBuff"}.Every 3rd attack is a powerful {"Piercing Shot", "TERM","PiercingShotBuff"}.

name: Void Altar
description: When played, it spreads a Void Soul of an {"Incubus", "CARD_REF","Incubus"}, {"Succubus", "CARD_REF","Succubus"} or {"Shadow Whelp", "CARD_REF","ShadowWhelp"} across the arena every 10 seconds (Max. 3).When a friendly Minion consumes a Void Soul, the Minion contained within is summoned by the Void Altar.

name: Mar'Dred, Prince of Nightmares
description: {"Mythic", "TERM","MythicBuff"}.When Mar'Dred attacks a Minion with 40% or less health, {"Destroy", "TERM","DestroyBuff"} it and inflict {"Fear", "TERM","FearBuff"} on nearby enemy Minions.{""The end is nigh"", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Illusory Dragon Whelp
description: Summons an {"Illusion", "TERM", "Illusion"} of a {"DragonWhelp", "CARD_REF", "DragonWhelp"}{"VoidborneWound", "TERM", "VoidborneWound"}: Summon 2 more

name: Pincer of Dread
description: Deal {"True Damage", "TERM","TrueDamage"} to the closest enemy Minion in the area.If it dies, all nearby enemy Minions are inflicted with {"Fear", "TERM","FearBuff"}.

name: Brothers Of The Void
description: This card has two sides. Switch sides on play.Side A - Summon an {"Assassin", "CARD_REF","Assassin"} with {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"}.Side B - Summon a {"Fire Imp", "CARD_REF","FireImp"} with {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"}.

name: Groggy Woodsman
description: Starts with half health and {"Slow", "TERM","AntiFrenzy"}.{"Revelry", "TERM","HiglandRevelry"}: gain {"Rage", "TERM","RageBuff"} and give nearby enemy Minions {"Slow", "TERM","AntiFrenzy"}.

name: Mountain Gale
description: For the duration of the spell, all Enemies have their speed reduced by 2 (Min. 1), while all friendly Minions gain 2 speed (Max. 7) and {"Heal", "TERM","HealKeyword"} 30 health per second. Also triggers {"Revelry", "TERM","HiglandRevelry"}.

name: Shield-Captain Avea
description: Burns [v:SelfBurnAndBuffOtherZealots.SELF_DAMAGE_PERCENT]% of her max health when she attacks.{"ShieldOfLight", "TERM", "ShieldOfLight"}[actorskillinfo:CardQuest,[mec:Quest]] Shield at least 1 other Minion with {"ShieldOfLight", "TERM", "ShieldOfLight"} 5 times[actorskillinfo:CardQuestReward,[mec:Reward]] Now summons with 4 {"Legionair", "CARD_REF", "Legionnaires"}

name: Rockin' Roller
description: A giant meteor slams the ground, dealing 200 damage on impact. It rolls forward dealing 100 damage over 2 seconds, pushing all enemy Minions in its path, until finally a {"Blue Golem", "CARD_REF","BlueGolem"} rises from the crater.

name: Lash of Ah'Mun
description: Calls upon the spirit of Ah'Mun to attack the area twice. (Damage dealt to the opponent Master is reduced to 10%)

name: Shroom Puff
description: Can only be summoned near your Master Tower.When it reaches the bridge, it turns into a {"Growthburst Shroom", "TERM","BerryBuff"}.{"Zen-Chi Flow", "TERM","ZenChiFlow"}: Summon 1 additional Growthburst Shroom.

name: Akinlep's Gong of Pestilence
description: Akinlep's Gong of Pestilence uses {"Poison Spit", "TERM","SlitherBeastPoisonAttack"} against Minions and {"Slam Attack", "TERM","SlitherBeastSlamAttack"} against buildings.When you play Akinlep's Gong of Pestilence, replace it with Ring The Gong (All nearby Enemy Minions take all Poison damage immediately. This card stays in your hand until Akinlep's Gong of Pestilence dies,  then it is replaced with Akinlep's Gong of Pestilence and sent to the bottom of your deck. Range: 15. Delay: 0.5 Sec.) in your hand.

name: Jing Long
description: When a spell is played Jing Long pops into another realm for 2 seconds.On return do {"Shocking Re-entry", "TERM","ShockingReentry"}.{"Zen-Chi Flow", "TERM","ZenChiFlow"}: do {"Shocking Re-entry", "TERM","ShockingReentry"} on spawn.

name: Chain Gang
description: Summon [cv:SummonSlitherboundAdvanced.SummonAmount] {"SlitherLancerSlave", "CARD_REF", "SlitherLancerSlave"}s.If you've played a card within the last [cv:SummonSlitherboundAdvanced.Variable] seconds, summon [cv:SummonSlitherboundAdvanced.SummonAmounts*0] {"SlitherDarterSlave", "CARD_REF", "SlitherDarterSlave"}s instead.

name: Ion Grenade
description: Deal damage to enemy Minions in a small area.{"Outlander Tech", "TERM","ScrapTech"} Explode an extra time for every 25 Tech spent (Max 3)

name: Scrap Yard
description: Consumes all Tech you have and gain 100 + 1.5x the consumed Tech over 25 secondsWhen you have 100 Tech Summon a random 3-5 mana Outlander Card and spend 20 Tech per Mana.

name: Vulture Prime A83
description: Inflicts {"TargetedBuff", "TERM", "TargetedBuff"}.{"ScrapTech", "TERM", "ScrapTech"}: spend 50 50 to gain {"SingleShieldBuff", "TERM", "SingleShieldBuff"}.

name: R4Z:0R Squadron
description: Unstable Core: Pay 4 Tech per second. If you cannot the R4Z:0R instead loses 10% health.When a R4Z:0R dies eject the {"Plasma Marines", "CARD_REF","PlasmaMarine"} piloting it.

name: T.A.A.S.
description: The enemy Minion in range with the least health gains {"Marked", "TERM","TargetedBuff"}.When you play T.A.A.S., replace it with H3LL-F1R3 in your hand.{"T.A.A.S. - Threat Analysis and Annihilation System.", "SUBTEXT"}

name: Chisma BOOMSTICK
description: {"Impatient", "TERM","PlaySelf"}. Launch 8 rockets in a circle. Give self {"Fear", "TERM","FearBuff"} after attack unless you have {"Scrat Swarm", "TERM","ScratSwarm"}

name: Impatient Statue
description: {"Cohort", "TERM", "Cohort]] ([cv:ImpatientStatue.Variable])]. [actorskillinfo:PlaySelf,[mec:[r:PlaySelf"}: If played impatiently gain {"FrenzyBuff", "TERM", "FrenzyBuff"}.
